name: modaledit-line-indicator
description: Dynamic line highlight for ModalEdit modes (normal, insert, visual, search). Changes line highlight color and style based on current mode for instant visual feedback.

commands.title: ModalEdit Line Indicator: Show Log File
ModalEdit Line Indicator: Query Current Mode (Debug)
ModalEdit Line Indicator: Clear Log File

modaledit-line-indicator.enabled.description: Enable or disable the line highlight indicator

modaledit-line-indicator.normalMode.description: Normal mode line highlight configuration. Supports theme-specific overrides with [dark], [light], and [highContrast] keys. Common properties (background, border, borderStyle, borderWidth) apply to all themes unless overridden.

modaledit-line-indicator.insertMode.description: Insert mode line highlight configuration. Supports theme-specific overrides with [dark], [light], and [highContrast] keys. Common properties (background, border, borderStyle, borderWidth) apply to all themes unless overridden.

modaledit-line-indicator.visualMode.description: Visual mode line highlight configuration. Supports theme-specific overrides with [dark], [light], and [highContrast] keys. Common properties (background, border, borderStyle, borderWidth) apply to all themes unless overridden.

modaledit-line-indicator.searchMode.description: Search mode line highlight configuration. Supports theme-specific overrides with [dark], [light], and [highContrast] keys. Common properties (background, border, borderStyle, borderWidth) apply to all themes unless overridden.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
